nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.drawables

Class SemanticDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.Group
          • nl.tudelft.dnainator.javafx.drawables.SemanticDrawable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Strain

    public abstract class SemanticDrawable
extends javafx.scene.Group
    An abstract drawable that enables a semantic display of data.

        public SemanticDrawable(javafx.scene.Group content,

    • Method Detail

      • loadContent

        protected abstract void loadContent(javafx.geometry.Bounds bounds)
        Load the Drawable content of the view itself. The overriding class must make sure that this method gets called either in the constructor or right after!
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds of the viewport.

      • loadChildren

        protected abstract void loadChildren(javafx.geometry.Bounds bounds)
        Load the drawable content of the view's children, given the bounds of the viewport.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds of the viewport.

      • isInViewport

        public boolean isInViewport(javafx.geometry.Bounds bounds)
        Check whether this object intersects with the given viewport bounds.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The given viewport bounds.
        Returns:
        True if (partially) in viewport, false otherwise.

      • toggle

        public void toggle(javafx.geometry.Bounds bounds,
                   boolean visible)
        Toggle between displaying own content or children.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds of the viewport.
        visible - True if the content needs to be visible, false otherwise.

      • update

        public void update(javafx.geometry.Bounds bounds,
                   double curZoom)
        Update method that should be called after scaling. This method checks how zoomed in we are by transforming bounds to root coordinates, and then dynamically adds and deletes items in the JavaFX scene graph.
        Parameters:
        bounds - The bounds of the viewport to update.
        curZoom - The current zoom level.
